12-Month Contract | Sydney / Hybrid

A leading insurer is undertaking a major transformation of its insurance platforms, modernising how broker data is interpreted, decisioned and responded to across underwriting systems.

We are seeking a Senior Business Analyst with strong insurance domain expertise to play a pivotal role in designing and shaping a business rules engine that will centralise complex underwriting logic and significantly improve the broker experience.

The Opportunity

This role sits within a modernisation program replacing multiple legacy platforms. A suite of APIs has already been established, and the focus is now on capturing, rationalising and structuring underwriting logic that currently exists across systems, spreadsheets and manual decisioning.




What Youâ€™ll Be Doing

Lead the analysis, definition and documentation of underwriting business rules for SME insurance products

Partner closely with underwriters, product teams and technology delivery squads to extract complex business logic

Help design a centralised business rules engine to interpret broker-submitted data and return clear, contextual outcomes

Translate underwriting decisioning into API-driven rules and workflows

Improve the overall broker experience

Act as a senior bridge between business and technology in a highly data- and logic-driven environment




What Youâ€™ll Bring

Essential

Strong insurance industry background, ideally within underwriting or product (not claims-led)

Proven understanding of underwriting language

Extensive experience as a Senior Business Analyst on complex transformation programs

Confidence working directly with underwriters and translating their intent into structured logic

Experience working with APIs, integrations and modern digital platforms

Highly analytical mindset with a focus on decisioning, data and customer outcomes

Nice to Have

Experience working with business rules engines or decision management platforms

SME or commercial insurance exposure

Experience modernising or replacing legacy insurance systems




Why This Role?

Complex, high-impact BA role focused on underwriting logic and decisioning

Opportunity to materially improve broker experience through better context and automation

Greenfield rules capability within a large insurance environment

12-month contract offering stability and depth of engagement




If youâ€™re an insurance-experienced Senior Business Analyst who enjoys turning complex underwriting logic into clear, automated outcomes, weâ€™d love to hear from you.

What you'll contribute to
